statements: SELECT * FROM players_inventory;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM players_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Weapon';
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM players_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM players_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM players_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT * FROM players_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM players_inventory WHERE item_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM players_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 AND item_type = 'armor' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type, quantity FROM players_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%' OR quantity > 20 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM players_inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM players_inventory);
SELECT id, item_name, item_type, player_id FROM virtual_items;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_type, id FROM virtual_items;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, id FROM virtual_items WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM virtual_items WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items WHERE item_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, player_id FROM virtual_items WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT item_type FROM virtual_items;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM virtual_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM player_gear GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM virtual_items WHERE item_quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM virtual_items WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM weapons WHERE weapon_damage > 50 ORDER BY weapon_damage DESC;
SELECT gear_name, gear_type FROM gear WHERE gear_level >= 5 ORDER BY gear_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM virtual_items WHERE item_quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_description FROM virtual_items WHERE item_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT weapon_name, weapon_type FROM weapons WHERE weapon_damage > 50 ORDER BY weapon_type ASC;
SELECT gear_name, gear_type, gear_level FROM gear WHERE gear_level >= 5 ORDER BY gear_level DESC, gear_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items JOIN weapons ON virtual_items.item_id = weapons.weapon_id WHERE virtual_items.item_quantity > weapons.weapon_damage ORDER BY virtual_items.item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_items WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM virtual_items GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level > 50;
SELECT weapon_name FROM weapons ORDER BY damage DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM gear WHERE durability < 50 ORDER BY durability DESC;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level >= 50 ORDER BY level ASC;
SELECT weapon_name, damage FROM weapons WHERE player_id = 1001 AND damage > 50;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items vi JOIN players p ON vi.player_id = p.id WHERE p.level <= 30;
SELECT * FROM virtual_items
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM virtual_items
SELECT owner_id, item_name, item_description FROM virtual_items ORDER BY owner_id DESC
SELECT * FROM weapons WHERE damage_points > 50
SELECT weapon_id, weapon_name FROM weapons WHERE owner_id = 123
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT gear_name, gear_type, defense_points FROM gear WHERE defense_points > 50 ORDER BY defense_points DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, owner_id FROM virtual_items WHERE owner_id = 12345;
SELECT weapon_name, weapon_type, durability FROM weapons WHERE damage_points > 100 ORDER BY durability ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
